roboguice.fragment
Class FragmentUtil

java.lang.Object
  roboguice.fragment.FragmentUtil

public final class FragmentUtil
extends Object

Fragment utility class, it's actual implementation will use native or support library v4 fragment's based on whether or not the underlying app uses support library or not.

Author:
Charles Munger
